name: Scary Room Game
description:
A top-down survival-horror game; embrace the unknown and survive for as long as possible with nothing but a flashlight and a taser.

Scary Room Game is a minimalist experience, but still contains much to explore:

  • 10 unique cryptid creatures, each with their own unique abilities to frighten or sabotage you, plus weaknesses and behaviors to learn and exploit
  • 3 game modes to experience,  including the highly customizable Five Minutes mode which allows you to select the cryptids that appear and how dangerous they are
  • A journal system that provides information and lore as you progress farther, aiding your research on the unknown
  • Secret modifiers can be unlocked through challenges, such as filling out the journal or setting a high score in Five Minutes mode, toggling these modifiers can adjust how the game plays
  • Automatic saving and stat tracking for high scores and cryptid encounters

I hope you find enjoyment in the game, even if you don't find it scary!
